title: (x) Ice Age movie logo - Fink Gothic {Dav}
content:
Hey fellow font freaks

I will love you forever if you can tell me what font is used in the Ice Age logo - or maybe just the text below. Or even if you have an idea to a font thats close or similar

go ahead and hunt for love

Mark,  
Denmark

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [iceage.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120219230941/http:/typophile.com/files/iceage.jpg) | 9.15 KB |
author: TheMark

comments.content:
' [Fink _( Gothic )_](http://web.archive.org/web/20120219230941/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=20&subpage=viewfonts)', by / from House Industries.

Dav
Darn, I wanted to be loved forever as well! Missed my opportunity. :^/

Wait, What about the love?  
Should I have left this one, for the ladies? :)

_Sorry._

Dav

Guys...

its love right there... !

Thanks formlos...

and the rest of you - thanks for trying...formlos is just too freakin fast

Mark
